languages.text: "Тогда почему же твое лицо исказил ужас, а не праведная ярость в ответ на мои слова?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
languages.original_text: "Тогда почему же твое лицо исказил ужас, а не праведная ярость в ответ на мои слова?"

traits.locale_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"
"Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

languages.text: “既然如此，那你为什么没有义愤填膺，而是在恐惧中扭紧了脸？”
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，那你为什么没有义愤填膺，而是在恐惧中扭紧了脸？”

languages.text: 「ならばなぜ、{mf|俺|私}の言葉でお前の顔が恐怖にこわばったのだ？なぜ、正義の怒りを持たなかった？」
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: 「ならばなぜ、{mf|俺|私}の言葉でお前の顔が恐怖にこわばったのだ？なぜ、正義の怒りを持たなかった？」

languages.text: «¿Entonces por qué mis palabras hicieron que su rostro se retorciera de miedo y no de ira?».
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Entonces por qué mis palabras hicieron que su rostro se retorciera de miedo y no de ira?».

languages.text: "Warum hat sich Euer Gesicht bei meinen Worten dann vor Angst verzerrt, nicht vor rechtschaffener Wut?"
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum hat sich Euer Gesicht bei meinen Worten dann vor Angst verzerrt, nicht vor rechtschaffener Wut?"

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, pourquoi mes paroles vous ont-elles inspiré de la peur, et non de la colère ? »
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, pourquoi mes paroles vous ont-elles inspiré de la peur, et non de la colère ? »

languages.text: "Öyleyse sözcüklerimin yüzünde oluşturduğu ifade neden korkuydu? Neden doğrucu bir hiddet değildi?"
languages.original_text: "Then why did my words cause your face to contort in fear and not righteous anger?"

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse sözcüklerimin yüzünde oluşturduğu ifade neden korkuydu? Neden doğrucu bir hiddet değildi?"
